---
title: "Harvest Against Hunger KCFS Visualizations"
author: "Maynard Maynard-Zhang"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
chooseCRANmirror(graphics = FALSE, ind = 1)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(knitr)
source("Functions.R")
source("Data/Data Compilation.R")
source("Static_Scripts/Vis 1 - Line.R")
source("Static_Scripts/Vis 2 - Map.R")
```

# Line Visualizations

```{r lines, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
plot(farms.line)
plot(orders.line)
plot(dollars.line)
plot(lbs.line)
plot(funds.line)
```

# Map Visualizations

```{r maps, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
plot(orders.map)
plot(dollars.map)
plot(lbs.map)
```
